title: Study techniques
brief_description: Shows the difficulties that some postprimary students have in effectively organising their study times. Suggests how to balance the conflicting needs of sport, socialising and other leisure activities with study. Also shows techniques for effective study and mentions the skim, read and make notes, personalise, summarise and revise methods.
